originalText.text:
Be careful with what this bank offers you. never accept loans or credit cards. Even if you pay punctually and have 100% excellent compliance, they will hurt you, make your life miserable and try to bring you down. They will never help you with anything. It is an evil and diabolical bank. Stay away from him.

The decisions the bank made with me were unfair and I do not deserve them. They managed to make me sick from the effect of the immense damage they did to me. I have never been late on a payment with them or with anyone. I have a 100% excellent payment compliance score on my credit record but they still canceled a card for probably using it too little. In another they lowered the credit limit, that affected my credit score and prevented me from doing many things. This bank is going to melt, be careful and stay away

originalText.text: They (reps) state that the customer should somehow  know their policy (even when they are not understanding the full issue).  They are not open to partial solutions and cannot open a misunderstood fraud designation to reverse it.  As soon as I can, I will look at other credit cards assuming I can forgo my Costco credit card.  Shame on you for not attending to the other customers who have taken their time and effort just to talk to a human.  I truly may go back to handling my shopping and other transactions using cash or check.  Banks don't want poor ratings.

originalText.text: I have a Citibank Wayfair card. I’ve had nothing but problems with this account ever since I opened it Wayfair and Citibank has the worst customer service. One of my additional cardholders card was used to place an order and she’s never even used the card. The card is still in the envelope Wayfair or Citibank don’t know how this happened but they are the only ones besides us with the card number. I really think someone in the Wayfair Citibank department is fraud their company. I’ve been locked out of my online account to check my own And I can’t get them to help me get into it. They are horrible and I mean horrible.

originalText.text: Had a very horrible experience with CitiBank recently. After years of being a customer, experienced some of the worst service I have seen in 39 years on this planet. I have been canceling all CitiCards and sugesting anyone who will listen does the same! They have gone down hill drasticaly in recent years and really not worth it. If you are thinking of opening an account, credit card etc. or applying for a job, be really wary!

originalText.text: Overall impression was Citi didn't want my business nor protected interests. This of course is a risk to any customers' financial planning. Recent rolling online services blackout are inappropriate. And there's also no branch in local area to add insult to injury for in-person assistance. Plus, customer service is offshore with unfortunately difficult to understand foreign accents. Citi cutting corners, so client services is on decline as other customer reviewers already noted. Free tip: Go bank where you're valued.
